author: ghellwig
body:
No functional change.
Just avoiding to manually integrate development and fixes of the non-CMS-specific tool GBL.
For historic reasons it was "integrated" by simply copying the code over to CMSSW.

This PR is a clean-up of this code duplication.

Supersedes #20262, but not its backports (the external is only added to 94X).
title: [94X] Replace GBL in CMSSW code with GBL code from external library.
